definitions.definition: To cause (someone) to feel unusually alarmed or delighted by something unexpected.
definitions.example: It surprises me that I owe twice as much as I thought I did.

definitions.definition: To do something to (a person) that they are not expecting, as a surprise.
definitions.example: He doesn’t know that I’m in the country – I thought I’d turn up at his house and surprise him.

definitions.definition: To undergo or witness something unexpected.
Caused to feel surprise, amazement or wonder, or showing an emotion due to an unexpected event.
